content: 1 That which was from the beginning､ Which we have heard､ Which we have seen with our eyes, Which we for ourselves gazed upon､ and our hands did handle､ Concerning the Word of Life,—
content_old: 1 That which was from the beginning､ Which we have heard､ Which we have seen with our eyes, Which we for ourselves gazed upon､ and our hands did handle､ Concerning the Word of Life,—

content: 2 And the Life was made manifest, and we have seen､ and are bearing witness､ and announcing unto you､ The Age-abiding Life, Which､ indeed､ was with the Father, and was made manifest unto us
content_old: 2 And the Life was made manifest, and we have seen､ and are bearing witness､ and announcing unto you､ The Age-abiding Life, Which､ indeed､ was with the Father, and was made manifest unto us

content: 3 That which we have seen and heard are we announcing even unto you, in order that ye too may have fellowship with us､ and our own fellowship also may be with the Father､ and with his Son Jesus Christ.
content_old: 3 That which we have seen and heard are we announcing even unto you, in order that ye too may have fellowship with us､ and our own fellowship also may be with the Father､ and with his Son Jesus Christ.

content: 4 And these things are we writing, in order that our joy may be made full.
content_old: 4 And these things are we writing, in order that our joy may be made full.

content: 5 And this is the message which we have heard from him､ and are reporting unto you,— That God is light, And in him is no darkness at all.
content_old: 5 And this is the message which we have heard from him､ and are reporting unto you,— That God is light, And in him is no darkness at all.

content: 6 If we say— We have felIowship with him! and in darkness are walking we are dealing falsely､ and not doing the truth;
content_old: 6 If we say— We have felIowship with him! and in darkness are walking we are dealing falsely､ and not doing the truth;

content: 7 whereas if in the light we are walking, as he is in the light we have fellowship one with another, and the blood of Jesus his Son is cleansing us from all sin.
content_old: 7 whereas if in the light we are walking, as he is in the light we have fellowship one with another, and the blood of Jesus his Son is cleansing us from all sin.

content: 8 If we say— Sin have we none! we are deceiving ourselves､ and the truth is not in us.
content_old: 8 If we say— Sin have we none! we are deceiving ourselves､ and the truth is not in us.

content: 9 If we are confessing our sins faithful is he and righteous､ that he should forgive us our sins､ and cleanse us from all unrighteousness.
content_old: 9 If we are confessing our sins faithful is he and righteous､ that he should forgive us our sins､ and cleanse us from all unrighteousness.

content: 1 My dear children! these things am I writing unto you､ in order that ye may not be committing sin. And if anyone should commit sin an Advocate have we with the Father, Jesus Christ､ the Righteous;
content_old: 1 My dear children! these things am I writing unto you､ in order that ye may not be committing sin. And if anyone should commit sin an Advocate have we with the Father, Jesus Christ､ the Righteous;

content: 2 and he is a propitiation concerning our sins,— and not concerning our own only but also concerning those of the whole world.
content_old: 2 and he is a propitiation concerning our sins,— and not concerning our own only but also concerning those of the whole world.

content: 3 And hereby perceive we､ that we understand him,—if his commandments we are keeping.
content_old: 3 And hereby perceive we､ that we understand him,—if his commandments we are keeping.

content: 4 He that saith— I understand him! and his commandments is not keeping is false, and in him the truth is not!
content_old: 4 He that saith— I understand him! and his commandments is not keeping is false, and in him the truth is not!

content: 5 But whosoever may be keeping his word of a truth in this man the love of God hath been made perfect. Hereby perceive we､ that in him we are.
content_old: 5 But whosoever may be keeping his word of a truth in this man the love of God hath been made perfect. Hereby perceive we､ that in him we are.

content: 6 He that saith､ that in him he abideth ought just as He walked himself also to be walking.
content_old: 6 He that saith､ that in him he abideth ought just as He walked himself also to be walking.

content: 7 Beloved! no new commandment am I writing unto you; but an old commandment､ which ye have been holding from the beginning: The old commandment is the word which ye have heard.
content_old: 7 Beloved! no new commandment am I writing unto you; but an old commandment､ which ye have been holding from the beginning: The old commandment is the word which ye have heard.

content: 8 Again a new commandment am I writing unto you,—which thing is true､ in him and in you, because the darkness is passing a way､ and the real light already is shining.
content_old: 8 Again a new commandment am I writing unto you,—which thing is true､ in him and in you, because the darkness is passing a way､ and the real light already is shining.

content: 9 He that saith he is in the light and hateth his brother is in the darkness､ until even now!
content_old: 9 He that saith he is in the light and hateth his brother is in the darkness､ until even now!

content: 10 He that loveth his brother is abiding in the light, and cause of stumbling in him is there none!
content_old: 10 He that loveth his brother is abiding in the light, and cause of stumbling in him is there none!

content: 11 Whereas he that hateth his brother in the darkness dwelleth､ and in the darkness walketh; and knoweth not whither he is drifting, because the darkness hath blinded his eyes.
content_old: 11 Whereas he that hateth his brother in the darkness dwelleth､ and in the darkness walketh; and knoweth not whither he is drifting, because the darkness hath blinded his eyes.

content: 12 I write unto you､ dear children, Because your sins have been forgiven you､ for the sake of his name:
content_old: 12 I write unto you､ dear children, Because your sins have been forgiven you､ for the sake of his name:

content: 13 I write unto you､ fathers, Because ye understand him who was from the beginning: I write unto you､ young men, Because ye have overcome the wicked one. I have written unto you､ little children, Because ye understand the Father:
content_old: 13 I write unto you､ fathers, Because ye understand him who was from the beginning: I write unto you､ young men, Because ye have overcome the wicked one. I have written unto you､ little children, Because ye understand the Father:

content: 14 I have written unto you､ fathers, Because ye understand him who was from the beginning: I have written you､ young men, Because ye are strong､ And the word of God within you abideth､ And ye have overcome the wicked one.
content_old: 14 I have written unto you､ fathers, Because ye understand him who was from the beginning: I have written you､ young men, Because ye are strong､ And the word of God within you abideth､ And ye have overcome the wicked one.

content: 15 Be not loving the world､ Nor yet the things that are in the world: If anyone be loving the world The love of the Father is not in him.
content_old: 15 Be not loving the world､ Nor yet the things that are in the world: If anyone be loving the world The love of the Father is not in him.

content: 16 Because all that is in the world— The coveting of the flesh､ The coveting of the eyes, And the vain grandeur of life— Is not of the Father､ but is of the world;
content_old: 16 Because all that is in the world— The coveting of the flesh､ The coveting of the eyes, And the vain grandeur of life— Is not of the Father､ but is of the world;

content: 17 And the world passeth away､ and the coveting thereof, But he that doeth the will of God endureth unto times age-abiding.
content_old: 17 And the world passeth away､ and the coveting thereof, But he that doeth the will of God endureth unto times age-abiding.

content: 18 Little children! it is the last hour; And just as ye have heard that an antichrist is coming Even now antichrists have become many, Whence we perceive that it is the last hour:
content_old: 18 Little children! it is the last hour; And just as ye have heard that an antichrist is coming Even now antichrists have become many, Whence we perceive that it is the last hour:

content: 19 From among us they went out､ But they were not of us; For if of us they had been They would in that case have abode with us; But it came to pass in order that they might be made manifest, Because all are not of us.
content_old: 19 From among us they went out､ But they were not of us; For if of us they had been They would in that case have abode with us; But it came to pass in order that they might be made manifest, Because all are not of us.

content: 20 And ye have an anointing from the Holy One,— Ye all know:
content_old: 20 And ye have an anointing from the Holy One,— Ye all know:

content: 21 I have not written unto you because ye know not the truth, But because ye know it､ And because no falsehood is of the truth.
content_old: 21 I have not written unto you because ye know not the truth, But because ye know it､ And because no falsehood is of the truth.

content: 22 Who is the False One;— Save he that denieth that Jesus is the Christ? The same is the Antichrist,— He that denieth the Father and the Son.
content_old: 22 Who is the False One;— Save he that denieth that Jesus is the Christ? The same is the Antichrist,— He that denieth the Father and the Son.

content: 23 Whosoever denieth the Son Neither hath he the Father: He that confesseth the Son Hath the Father also.
content_old: 23 Whosoever denieth the Son Neither hath he the Father: He that confesseth the Son Hath the Father also.

content: 24 As for you What ye have heard from the beginning In you let it abide. If in you shall abide､ that which from the beginning ye have heard Ye also in the Son and in the Father shall abide.
content_old: 24 As for you What ye have heard from the beginning In you let it abide. If in you shall abide､ that which from the beginning ye have heard Ye also in the Son and in the Father shall abide.

content: 25 And this is the promise､ which he hath promised unto us,— The age-abiding life.
content_old: 25 And this is the promise､ which he hath promised unto us,— The age-abiding life.

content: 26 These things have I written unto you､ concerning them who would lead you astray.
content_old: 26 These things have I written unto you､ concerning them who would lead you astray.

content: 27 And as for you The anointing which ye have received from him abideth in you, and ye have no need that anyone be teaching you; But as his anointing is teaching you, And is true､ and is no falsehood Even just as it hath taught you Abide ye in him.
content_old: 27 And as for you The anointing which ye have received from him abideth in you, and ye have no need that anyone be teaching you; But as his anointing is teaching you, And is true､ and is no falsehood Even just as it hath taught you Abide ye in him.

content: 28 And now､ dear children､ abide ye in him, In order that if he be made manifest we may have boldness､ and not be shamed away from him by his presence.
content_old: 28 And now､ dear children､ abide ye in him, In order that if he be made manifest we may have boldness､ and not be shamed away from him by his presence.

content: 1 Behold what manner of love the Father hath bestowed upon us— That children of God we should be called,— And such we are! Therefore the world understandeth us not, Because it understood not him.
content_old: 1 Behold what manner of love the Father hath bestowed upon us— That children of God we should be called,— And such we are! Therefore the world understandeth us not, Because it understood not him.

content: 2 Beloved! now are we children of God; And not yet hath it been made manifest what we shall be,— We know that if it should be made manifest Like unto him shall we be, Because we shall see him just as he is.
content_old: 2 Beloved! now are we children of God; And not yet hath it been made manifest what we shall be,— We know that if it should be made manifest Like unto him shall we be, Because we shall see him just as he is.

content: 3 And whosoever hath this hope on him Is purifying himself, just as He is pure.
content_old: 3 And whosoever hath this hope on him Is purifying himself, just as He is pure.

content: 4 Whosoever is committing sin Lawlessness also is committing, And sin is lawlessness;
content_old: 4 Whosoever is committing sin Lawlessness also is committing, And sin is lawlessness;

content: 5 And ye know､ that He was made manifest— In order that our sins he should take away, And sin in him is there none.
content_old: 5 And ye know､ that He was made manifest— In order that our sins he should take away, And sin in him is there none.

content: 6 Whosoever in him doth abide Is not sinning: Whosoever is sinning Hath not seen him､ and doth not understand him.
content_old: 6 Whosoever in him doth abide Is not sinning: Whosoever is sinning Hath not seen him､ and doth not understand him.

content: 7 Dear children! let no one lead you astray! He that is doing righteousness is righteous, Just as He is righteous:
content_old: 7 Dear children! let no one lead you astray! He that is doing righteousness is righteous, Just as He is righteous:

content: 8 He that is committing sin is of the adversary, Because from the beginning the adversary is sinning. To this end was the Son of God made manifest, In order that he might undo the works of the adversary.
content_old: 8 He that is committing sin is of the adversary, Because from the beginning the adversary is sinning. To this end was the Son of God made manifest, In order that he might undo the works of the adversary.

content: 9 Whosoever hath been born of God is not committing sin, Because a seed of him within him abideth; And he cannot be committing sin, Because of God hath he been born.
content_old: 9 Whosoever hath been born of God is not committing sin, Because a seed of him within him abideth; And he cannot be committing sin, Because of God hath he been born.

content: 10 Herein are manifest the children of God､ and the children of the adversary: Whoever is not doing righteousness is not of God, Nor yet he that is not loving his brother.
content_old: 10 Herein are manifest the children of God､ and the children of the adversary: Whoever is not doing righteousness is not of God, Nor yet he that is not loving his brother.

content: 11 Because this is the message which ye have heard from the beginning— That we should be loving one another,—
content_old: 11 Because this is the message which ye have heard from the beginning— That we should be loving one another,—

content: 12 Not just as Cain was of the wicked one and slew his brother! And for what cause slew he him? Because his works were wicked, Whereas those of his brother were righteous.
content_old: 12 Not just as Cain was of the wicked one and slew his brother! And for what cause slew he him? Because his works were wicked, Whereas those of his brother were righteous.

content: 13 Be not marvelling､ brethren, if the world is hating you:
content_old: 13 Be not marvelling､ brethren, if the world is hating you:

content: 14 We know､ that we have passed over out of death into life, Because we love the brethren: He that loveth not abideth in death.
content_old: 14 We know､ that we have passed over out of death into life, Because we love the brethren: He that loveth not abideth in death.

content: 15 Whosoever is hating his brother is a murderer; And ye know that no murderer hath life age-during within him abiding.
content_old: 15 Whosoever is hating his brother is a murderer; And ye know that no murderer hath life age-during within him abiding.

content: 16 Hereby have we come to understand love: In that He for us his life laid down; And we ought for the brethren our lives to lay down.
content_old: 16 Hereby have we come to understand love: In that He for us his life laid down; And we ought for the brethren our lives to lay down.

content: 17 But whoso hath this world’s goods､ And beholdeth his brother having need, And shutteth up his tender affections from him How is the love of God abiding in him?
content_old: 17 But whoso hath this world’s goods､ And beholdeth his brother having need, And shutteth up his tender affections from him How is the love of God abiding in him?

content: 18 Dear children! Let us not be loving in word､ nor yet with the tongue, But in deed and truth.
content_old: 18 Dear children! Let us not be loving in word､ nor yet with the tongue, But in deed and truth.

content: 19 Hereby shall we get to know､ that of the truth we are, And before him shall persuade our heart;
content_old: 19 Hereby shall we get to know､ that of the truth we are, And before him shall persuade our heart;

content: 20 Because if our own heart condemn us Greater is God､ than our heart, and perceiveth all things.
content_old: 20 Because if our own heart condemn us Greater is God､ than our heart, and perceiveth all things.

content: 21 Beloved! if our heart be not condemning us Boldness have we､ towards God;
content_old: 21 Beloved! if our heart be not condemning us Boldness have we､ towards God;

content: 22 And whatsoever we are asking we are receiving from him, Because his commandments are we keeping､ And the things that are pleasing before him are we doing.
content_old: 22 And whatsoever we are asking we are receiving from him, Because his commandments are we keeping､ And the things that are pleasing before him are we doing.

content: 23 And this is his commandment,— That we should believe in the name of his Son Jesus Christ､ And be loving one another— Just as he gave a commandment unto us.
content_old: 23 And this is his commandment,— That we should believe in the name of his Son Jesus Christ､ And be loving one another— Just as he gave a commandment unto us.

content: 1 Beloved! not in every spirit believe ye, But test the spirits､ whether they are of God; Because many false prophets have gone out into the world.
content_old: 1 Beloved! not in every spirit believe ye, But test the spirits､ whether they are of God; Because many false prophets have gone out into the world.

content: 2 Hereby do ye perceive the Spirit of God:— Every spirit that confesseth Jesus Christ as having come in flesh Is of God;
content_old: 2 Hereby do ye perceive the Spirit of God:— Every spirit that confesseth Jesus Christ as having come in flesh Is of God;

content: 3 And every spirit that doth not confess Jesus Of God is not. And this is the spirit of the Antichrist, Touching which ye have heard that it cometh: Even now is it in the world already.
content_old: 3 And every spirit that doth not confess Jesus Of God is not. And this is the spirit of the Antichrist, Touching which ye have heard that it cometh: Even now is it in the world already.

content: 4 Ye are of God､ dear children, and have overcome them; Because greater is he that is in you､ than he that is in the world.
content_old: 4 Ye are of God､ dear children, and have overcome them; Because greater is he that is in you､ than he that is in the world.

content: 5 They are of the world: For this cause of the world they speak, And the world unto them doth hearken.
content_old: 5 They are of the world: For this cause of the world they speak, And the world unto them doth hearken.

content: 6 We are of God: He that is getting to understand God hearkeneth unto us,— Whoso is not of God hearkeneth not unto us: From this perceive we— The spirit of truth､ And the spirit of error.
content_old: 6 We are of God: He that is getting to understand God hearkeneth unto us,— Whoso is not of God hearkeneth not unto us: From this perceive we— The spirit of truth､ And the spirit of error.

content: 7 Beloved! let us be loving one another; Because love is of God, And whosoever loveth Of God hath been born､ And is getting to understand God:
content_old: 7 Beloved! let us be loving one another; Because love is of God, And whosoever loveth Of God hath been born､ And is getting to understand God:

content: 8 He that doth not love Doth not understand God, Because God is love.
content_old: 8 He that doth not love Doth not understand God, Because God is love.

content: 9 Herein hath the love of God in us been made manifest, That his only-begotten Son God sent into the world, In order that we might live through him.
content_old: 9 Herein hath the love of God in us been made manifest, That his only-begotten Son God sent into the world, In order that we might live through him.

content: 10 Herein is love: Not that we have loved God, But that he loved us､ And sent forth his Son､ as a propitiation concerning our sins.
content_old: 10 Herein is love: Not that we have loved God, But that he loved us､ And sent forth his Son､ as a propitiation concerning our sins.

content: 11 Beloved! if in this way God loved us We also ought to love one another.
content_old: 11 Beloved! if in this way God loved us We also ought to love one another.

content: 12 Upon God hath no one､ at any time､ gazed: If we love one another God in us abideth, And his love hath been perfected within us.
content_old: 12 Upon God hath no one､ at any time､ gazed: If we love one another God in us abideth, And his love hath been perfected within us.

content: 13 Hereby perceive we— That in him are we abiding, And he in us,— In that of his Spirit hath he given unto us.
content_old: 13 Hereby perceive we— That in him are we abiding, And he in us,— In that of his Spirit hath he given unto us.

content: 14 And we for ourselves have gazed, and are bearing witness— That the Father sent forth the Son､ as Saviour of the world.
content_old: 14 And we for ourselves have gazed, and are bearing witness— That the Father sent forth the Son､ as Saviour of the world.

content: 15 Whosoever shall confess､ that Jesus Christ is the Son of God God in him abideth､ And he in God.
content_old: 15 Whosoever shall confess､ that Jesus Christ is the Son of God God in him abideth､ And he in God.

content: 16 And we have come to understand and to trust the love which God hath in us. God is love; And he that abideth in love in God abideth, And God in him abideth.
content_old: 16 And we have come to understand and to trust the love which God hath in us. God is love; And he that abideth in love in God abideth, And God in him abideth.

content: 17 Herein hath love with us been made perfect,— In order that boldness we might have in the day of judging,— In that just as He is We also are in this world.
content_old: 17 Herein hath love with us been made perfect,— In order that boldness we might have in the day of judging,— In that just as He is We also are in this world.

content: 18 Fear existeth not in love, But perfect love casteth fear outside; Because fear hath correction: He that feareth hath not been made perfect in love.
content_old: 18 Fear existeth not in love, But perfect love casteth fear outside; Because fear hath correction: He that feareth hath not been made perfect in love.

content: 19 We love, because he first loved us:—
content_old: 19 We love, because he first loved us:—

content: 20 If one should say I love God and should be hating his brother false is he; For he that doth not love his brother whom he hath seen God､ whom he hath not seen he cannot love!
content_old: 20 If one should say I love God and should be hating his brother false is he; For he that doth not love his brother whom he hath seen God､ whom he hath not seen he cannot love!

content: 1 Whosoever believeth that Jesus is the Christ Of God hath been born: And whosoever loveth him that begat Loveth him that hath been begotten of him.
content_old: 1 Whosoever believeth that Jesus is the Christ Of God hath been born: And whosoever loveth him that begat Loveth him that hath been begotten of him.

content: 2 Hereby perceive we､ that we love the children of God As soon as God we love､ And his commandments we are doing.
content_old: 2 Hereby perceive we､ that we love the children of God As soon as God we love､ And his commandments we are doing.

content: 3 For this is the love of God— That his commandments we be keeping, And his commandments are not burden some;
content_old: 3 For this is the love of God— That his commandments we be keeping, And his commandments are not burden some;

content: 4 Because whatsoever hath been born of God overcometh the world; And this is the victory that hath overcome the world— Our faith.
content_old: 4 Because whatsoever hath been born of God overcometh the world; And this is the victory that hath overcome the world— Our faith.

content: 5 And who is he that overcometh the world, Save he that believeth That Jesus is the Son of God?
content_old: 5 And who is he that overcometh the world, Save he that believeth That Jesus is the Son of God?

content: 6 This is he that came through means of water and blood､ Jesus Christ: Not by the water only､ But by the water and by the blood,— And the Spirit it is､ that is bearing witness, Because the Spirit is the truth.
content_old: 6 This is he that came through means of water and blood､ Jesus Christ: Not by the water only､ But by the water and by the blood,— And the Spirit it is､ that is bearing witness, Because the Spirit is the truth.

content: 7 Because three are they who are bearing witness—
content_old: 7 Because three are they who are bearing witness—

content: 8 The Spirit､ and the Water､ and the Blood; And the three are witnesses unto one thing.
content_old: 8 The Spirit､ and the Water､ and the Blood; And the three are witnesses unto one thing.

content: 9 If the witness of men we receive The witness of God is greater. Because this is the witness of God—— In that he hath borne witness concerning his Son,—
content_old: 9 If the witness of men we receive The witness of God is greater. Because this is the witness of God—— In that he hath borne witness concerning his Son,—

content: 10 He that believeth on the Son of God Hath the witness within himself: He that doth not believe God False hath made him,— Because he hath not believed on the witness which God hath witnessed concerning his Son—
content_old: 10 He that believeth on the Son of God Hath the witness within himself: He that doth not believe God False hath made him,— Because he hath not believed on the witness which God hath witnessed concerning his Son—

content: 11 And this is the witness:— That life age-abiding hath God given unto us, And this life is in his Son:
content_old: 11 And this is the witness:— That life age-abiding hath God given unto us, And this life is in his Son:

content: 12 He that hath the Son hath the life,— He that hath not the Son of God hath not the life.
content_old: 12 He that hath the Son hath the life,— He that hath not the Son of God hath not the life.

content: 13 These things have I written unto you— In order that ye may know that ye have Life Age-abiding— Unto you who believe on the name of the Son of God.
content_old: 13 These things have I written unto you— In order that ye may know that ye have Life Age-abiding— Unto you who believe on the name of the Son of God.

content: 14 And this is the boldness which we have towards him: That if anything we ask according to his will He doth hearken unto us.
content_old: 14 And this is the boldness which we have towards him: That if anything we ask according to his will He doth hearken unto us.

content: 15 And if we know that he doth hearken unto us､ Whatsoever we ask We know that we have the things asked､ Which we have asked of him,
content_old: 15 And if we know that he doth hearken unto us､ Whatsoever we ask We know that we have the things asked､ Which we have asked of him,

content: 16 If one should see his brother committing a sin､ Not unto death He shall ask､ and He will grant unto him life,— For them who are sinning､ not unto death. There is a sin､ unto death: Not concerning that am I saying､ that he should make request.
content_old: 16 If one should see his brother committing a sin､ Not unto death He shall ask､ and He will grant unto him life,— For them who are sinning､ not unto death. There is a sin､ unto death: Not concerning that am I saying､ that he should make request.

content: 17 All unrighteousness is sin, And there is a sin not unto death.
content_old: 17 All unrighteousness is sin, And there is a sin not unto death.

content: 18 We know that whosoever hath been born of God Is not committing sin,— Nay he that hath been born of God He keepeth him, And the wicked one doth not touch him.
content_old: 18 We know that whosoever hath been born of God Is not committing sin,— Nay he that hath been born of God He keepeth him, And the wicked one doth not touch him.

content: 19 We know that of God are we; And the whole world in the wicked one is lying.
content_old: 19 We know that of God are we; And the whole world in the wicked one is lying.

content: 20 We know､ moreover､ that the Son of God hath come, And hath given us insight､ So that we are getting to understand him that is Real,— And we are in him that is Real, In his Son Jesus Christ. This is the Real God, and life age-abiding.
content_old: 20 We know､ moreover､ that the Son of God hath come, And hath given us insight､ So that we are getting to understand him that is Real,— And we are in him that is Real, In his Son Jesus Christ. This is the Real God, and life age-abiding.
